markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dancing Leaf](/Feats.aspx?ID=5986) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 120 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You are as light as a leaf on the breeze. When you [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298) or succeed at a [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378), increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from [falling](/Rules.aspx?ID=402), don't count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.
name: Dancing Leaf

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Dancing Leaf Source Player Core 2 pg. 120 1.1 --- You are as light as a leaf on the breeze. When you Leap or succeed at a High Jump or Long Jump, increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from falling, don't count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.
